name: TURBOSAURUS HERO
description:
It's an LD46 entry.

It's the end of an age. Dinosaurs are dying. Take the destiny of one of the last Turbosaurus in your hands. Help him reach salvation by making sure he keeps good cardio, breathes frequently and eat well.

TIPS

- Press displayed keys to use organs.
- M and B should me mashed.
- You can look ahead with E for incoming food (green little dinos)

TEAM

Boris Berger

Swann Klein (@pinataMAN)

Alexandre Pernot Lopes (@apernotlopes)
